snippet.title: Wild Metal Trailer
snippet.description:
The Wild Metal Trailer from the Exclusive Dreamcast Preview CD-ROM that released prior to the console's launch in 1999. The game was later released in North America on February 1st, 2000.

#Dreamcast #WildMetal #Trailer
